summary: During WW2, German POWs in Britain plot to escape from their prison camp in Scotland.
cast: Brian Keith|Helmut Griem|Ian Hendry|Jack Watson|Patrick O'Connell|Horst Janson|Alexander Allerson|John Abineri|Constantine Gregory|Tom Kempinski|Eric Allan|Caroline Mortimer|Mary Larkin|Gregg Palmer|Michael Sheard|Ingo Mogendorf|Emmet Bergin|Barry Cassin|Martin Dempsey|Alec Doran|Conor Evans|Frank Hayden|Vernon Hayden|Lamont Johnson|John Kavanagh|David Kelly|Des Keogh|Brendan Matthews|Jim Mooney|Mark Mulholland|Paul Murphy|Desmond Perry|Joe Pilkington|Noel Purcell|Robert Rietty|Robert Somerset|Franz Van Norde
keywords: prisoner of war camp|escape attempt|strangulation|power struggle|brutality
title: Los que saben morir
